page.title: 19My Day
page.content: On Friday we do baking.We have P.E. on Friday before we go home.We have a little garden and grow daffodils in it.We have a playing field next to our school.All the children of the village come and play rounders and football on it.My favourite subject in the class is Peak Maths.I live in Winster and on the way to school pass the Market House.It takes me five to ten minutes to get to school. We have a computer at school.I have school dinners.A man called Mr.Len Webster brings them in his van. I have guitar and recorder lessons at school.
